catalog.name: Map
catalog.Description: Use entity GIS coordinates to plot the location of the entity in Google Maps.

catalog.name: Timeline
catalog.Description: Use entity dates to plot the lifetime of the entity.

catalog.name: Network display
catalog.Description: Display an RDF graph using its network representation.

catalog.name: Full text search
catalog.Description: Use Lucene to return a list of entities containing specific text.

catalog.name: SPARQL query
catalog.Description: Use SPARQL commands to find entities with specific properties or relationships.

catalog.name: Date query
catalog.Description: Find entities with a date within a certain data range

catalog.name: Location query
catalog.Description: Find entities with a location within a certain location range

catalog.name: Relationship query
catalog.Description: Find people related to a specified person

catalog.name: Import people from friend-of-a-friend
catalog.Description: Find people specified people in the friend-of-a-friend database and import them into the selected project.

catalog.name: Import a CSV file
catalog.Description: Select a CSV file on the desktop and import it into the selected project.

catalog.name: Export a CSV file
catalog.Description: Create a CSV file on the desktop and derive its contents from the selected project.

catalog.name: Data entry
catalog.Description: Create an entity, fill in its fields and save it in the selected project.

catalog.name: Data modification
catalog.Description: Select an an entity in the selected project, change its fields and save it.

catalog.name: Report on people
catalog.Description: Count the number of people in the triple store.
